channel.title: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?
channel.description:
HP just decided to liquidate their tablets, [url=http://www.futureshop.ca/en-CA/product/hewlett-packard-hp-16gb-touchpad-with-wi-fi-16gb-wifi/10173116.aspx?path=01191e3f32fb2966d8a052fd3272bd05en02]http://www.futureshop.ca/en-CA/product/hewlett-packard-hp-16gb-touchpad-with-wi-fi-16gb-wifi/10173116.aspx?path=01191e3f32fb2966d8a052fd3272bd05en02[/url] is this worth buying for $99?
go to the hpwebsite: [url=http://h41112.www4.hp.com/promo/webos/ca/en/tablet/touchpad.html?jumpid=re_552_ca/en/hpstore/banners/touchpad5/20110721]http://h41112.www4.hp.com/promo/webos/ca/en/tablet/touchpad.html?jumpid=re_552_ca/en/hpstore/banners/touchpad5/20110721[/url]
and click on any of the overview videos, i think the website got hacked :) funny as hell

item.title: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:12, topic:411177”]I’m hoping some UK retailers start doing similar price cuts of their touchpad stock. I’d buy one, and if WebOS didn’t progress anymore with it’s community of developers taking it on themselves, then I could always use it to put Android on it. It has a quick dual core processor and enough RAM.[/quote]http://rootzwiki.com/showthread.php?t=3327

i ordered one today for that reason

Read full topic
item.source: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?

item.title: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’m hoping some UK retailers start doing similar price cuts of their touchpad stock. I’d buy one, and if WebOS didn’t progress anymore with it’s community of developers taking it on themselves, then I could always use it to put Android on it. It has a quick dual core processor and enough RAM.

Read full topic

item.title: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

WebOS is nice. Buy it, it is just as good if not better than all the Android tablets at the moment, with the exception of the new Samsung Galaxy tab 10.1.

item.title: Look fast, should i buy this? worth buying for $99?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“Radeon, post:3, topic:411177”]gogogogogogogogogo

shit cant find an australian store that sells for that price[/quote]

I went early as possible lined up before the store [futureshop] open and tehy fag manager claimed its all sold out, i don’t know how they sold out with out even opening the store. Went inside and met my friend who works at the electronic department…they got about 8 of them still in stock and they were hording. got a 16GB one but some times it freezes when switching between apps

you can also order in from the HP website

Read full topic
